about_the_game:
This DLC pack includes the following items:

ESTIVAL VERSUS BGM Pack

After purchasing this item, you will be able to change the BGM for "Shinobi Transformation" and "Frantic Mode" with the "Switch BGM" option in the game's settings.
detailed_description:
This DLC pack includes the following items:

ESTIVAL VERSUS BGM Pack

After purchasing this item, you will be able to change the BGM for "Shinobi Transformation" and "Frantic Mode" with the "Switch BGM" option in the game's settings.
